title: Perform Inventory Cycle Count
description: A warehouse manager needs to perform a cycle count for a specific section of the warehouse to ensure inventory accuracy.

tasks.description: Generate a list of products and their expected quantities for a specific warehouse aisle.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the list of SKUs and their system quantities for 'Aisle 5'.

tasks.description: Record the actual physical counts for each product provided by the warehouse staff.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent inputs the physically counted numbers.

tasks.description: Compare the system count to the physical count and flag any discrepancies for investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a discrepancy report highlighting items that need investigation.
